com.tedros.fxapi.annotation.reader

Annotation Type TColumnReader


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=ANNOTATION_TYPE)
public @interface TColumnReader
    Author:
    Davis Gordon

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String field
      The field name of modelView or entity to show at column.
      java.lang.String name
      The column name.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      TBooleanValues booleanValues
      Specifies a description for boolean fields.
      java.lang.String columnHeaderHtmlAttribute
      Default value: ;
      java.lang.String columnHeaderHtmlStyle
      Default value: ;
      java.lang.String columnHtmlAttribute
      Default value: ;
      java.lang.String columnHtmlStyle
      TConverter converter
      Specifies a converter class.
      java.lang.String datePattern
      Specifies a date pattern for Date fields.
      java.lang.String fieldValueHtmlStyle
      Sets a css string to be used at the tag defined in htmlTemplateForControlValue().
      java.lang.String fieldValueHtmlTemplate
      Define a html to wrap the control value.
      java.lang.String mask
      Specifies a mask for the value.

    • Element Detail

      • field

        public abstract java.lang.String field
         The field name of modelView or entity to show at column.

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
         The column name.

      • fieldValueHtmlTemplate

        public abstract java.lang.String fieldValueHtmlTemplate
          Define a html to wrap the control value. 
  
  Important: The key %STYLE% and %CONTENT% must in the html string to 
  be replaced.
  
  Default value: <span id='contentControlValue' style='%STYLE%'>%CONTENT%</span>
        Default:
        "<span style=\'%STYLE%\'>%CONTENT%</span>"

      • fieldValueHtmlStyle

        public abstract java.lang.String fieldValueHtmlStyle
          Sets a css string to be used at the tag defined in htmlTemplateForControlValue(). 
  
  Default value: margin:2px;
        Default:
        "font-size: #{READER_TEXT_SIZE}em; color: #{READER_TEXT_COLOR}; "

      • columnHeaderHtmlStyle

        public abstract java.lang.String columnHeaderHtmlStyle
          
  Default value: ;
        Default:
        "border-bottom: 1px solid #{PANEL_BACKGROUND_COLOR};"

      • columnHeaderHtmlAttribute

        public abstract java.lang.String columnHeaderHtmlAttribute
          
  Default value: ;
        Default:
        "align=\'left\'"

      • columnHtmlStyle

        public abstract java.lang.String columnHtmlStyle
        Default:
        "text-align:center; border-bottom: 1px solid #{PANEL_BACKGROUND_COLOR};"

      • columnHtmlAttribute

        public abstract java.lang.String columnHtmlAttribute
          
  Default value: ;
        Default:
        "align=\'left\'"

      • mask

        public abstract java.lang.String mask
          Specifies a mask for the value.  
  
  Default value: empty string
        Default:
        ""

      • datePattern

        public abstract java.lang.String datePattern
          Specifies a date pattern for Date fields.  
  
  Default value: dd/MM/yyyy
        Default:
        "dd/MM/yyyy"

      • booleanValues

        public abstract TBooleanValues booleanValues
          Specifies a description for boolean fields.  
  
  Default value: @TBooleanValues()
        Default:
        @com.tedros.fxapi.annotation.TBooleanValues

      • converter

        public abstract TConverter converter
        Specifies a converter class.
        Default:
        @com.tedros.fxapi.annotation.control.TConverter(type=com.tedros.fxapi.form.TConverter.class, parse=false)
